summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Jhun Black Barber PWA. All core functionality working excellently including booking flow, admin dashboard, PWA features, and mocked notifications.

minor_issues.impact: No functional impact - appointment creation works correctly
No functional impact - slot blocking works correctly

passed_tests: Landing page loads with JBB logo and AGENDA ABERTA title
BOOK NOW button functional and navigates to booking
All 13 services displayed with correct prices and durations
Available time slots displayed (24 slots found)
Customer information form accepts required fields
Booking confirmation page shows appointment details
PWA manifest.json accessible with correct configuration
Mocked notifications working (SMS, Email, WhatsApp logs confirmed)
